title: Nou ni Sumaho ga Umerareta!
overview: "Where did my life go wrong?"Divorced, in need to pay child-support, and now a layoff candidate at his company; Orimo Keita, 34 years old was in the pits of despair. However, it all changes when his brain suddenly became a smartphone! Now his vision can see messages people send on their phones, which also means that he can learn their secrets. This new ability gets him intertwined with problems in and out of the office! A Sci-fi human drama about a simple man becoming a "Smartphone" hero.
